item.title: Getting Things Done
item.description: 4th year in university Excelent book! Exactly what I love. It is algorithm of doing things. I have not finished reading it because I need to implement a lot of things in practice and then continue. I think to return to reading it when I feel I need to.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, my name is Rostislav, and I’m Software Engineer from Moscow, Russia and I love programming in Go. As a professional I have been programming since 2014 and doing on a commercial basis since 2019. My first programming language was MATLAB. I wrote numerous projects during my studies in university related to engineering and math. After that I got two courses on C++ to understand internals more deeply. I get used to write high perfomarnce code.
